activeKey.description: The key of the currently active tab panel
activeKey.description_zh: 当前激活 tab 面板的 key

:addIcon.description: Customize the Add button, valid when type="editable-card"
:addIcon.description_zh: 自定义添加按钮，设置 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

:animated.description: Whether or not to use animation to switch tabs, only for 'tabPosition="top"'
:animated.description_zh: 是否使用动画切换 Tabs, 仅生效于 `tabPosition="top"`

centered.description: Tags are displayed in the center

defaultActiveKey.description: Initialize the key of the selected panel, if you do not set the activeKey
defaultActiveKey.description_zh: 初始化选中面板的 key，如果没有设置 activeKey

hideAdd.description: Whether to hide the plus icon, which is valid when 'type="editable-card"'
hideAdd.description_zh: 是否隐藏加号图标，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

:indicator.description: Customize the length and alignment of the indicator
:indicator.type: { size?: number / (origin: number) => number; align: start / center / end; }
:indicator.description_zh: 自定义指示条的长度和对齐方式

:removeIcon.description: Custom delete button, valid when type="editable-card"
:removeIcon.description_zh: 自定义删除按钮，设置 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

:renderTabBar.description: Replaces the TabBar for the secondary encapsulation of the label header
:renderTabBar.description_zh: 替换 TabBar，用于二次封装标签头

size.description_zh: 大小，提供 `large` `middle` 和 `small` 三种大小

:tabBarExtraContent.description_zh: tab bar 上额外的元素

destroyInactiveTabPane.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure when hidden
destroyInactiveTabPane.description_zh: 被隐藏时是否销毁 DOM 结构

type.description: The basic style of the tab, you can choose 'line', 'card', 'editable-card' type
type.description_zh: 页签的基本样式，可选 `line`、`card` `editable-card` 类型

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onEdit
events.description: Callbacks for adding and removing tabs are valid when 'type="editable-card"'
events.description_zh: 新增和删除页签的回调，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

events.name: onTabScroll
events.params: ({ direction: left / right / top / bottom }) => void

TabItemType.name: closeIcon
TabItemType.description: Custom close icon, valid when type="editable-card". 5.7.0: Hide close button when set to null or false
TabItemType.description_zh: 自定义关闭图标，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效。5.7.0：设置为 `null` 或 `false` 时隐藏关闭按钮

TabItemType.name: destroyInactiveTabPane
TabItemType.description: Whether to destroy DOM structure when hidden
TabItemType.description_zh: 被隐藏时是否销毁 DOM 结构

TabItemType.name: forceRender
TabItemType.description: Whether to render DOM structure when hidden
TabItemType.description_zh: 被隐藏时是否渲染 DOM 结构

TabItemType.name: closable
TabItemType.description: Whether to show the close button for the tab, valid when type="editable-card"
TabItemType.description_zh: 是否显示选项卡的关闭按钮，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

MoreProps.name: dropdownProps
MoreProps.description_zh: 传递给 Dropdown 组件的属性
